title: Diesel shipment to reach SL in three days
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Ministry of Power and Energy said that another shipment of Diesel will reach Sri Lanka within three days.
A senior spokesman said that steps are being taken to place another order for a shipment of petrol.
The Ministry of Power and Energy re-emphasized that there are sufficient fuel stocks in the country.
